StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_ODSE_ImportToPerson]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
-- Update Person table UPDATE PERSON SET FIRST_NAME = OI.FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME = OI.LAST_NAME, USER_LOGIN = 'MCMODSINTERFACE', UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() FROM ODSE_IMPORT OI INNER JOIN PERSON P ON (RIGHT(OI.SSN,9)=P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER)
SELECT RIGHT(O.SSN,9) as 'SSN', O.FIRST_NAME, O.MIDDLE_INITIAL, O.LAST_NAME, 'MCMODSINTERFACE' as 'USER_LOGIN', GETDATE() as 'UPDATE_DATE' into #PersonTemp FROM ODSE_IMPORT O LEFT OUTER JOIN PERSON P ON (RIGHT(O.SSN,9)=P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER) WHERE P.FIRST_NAME IS NULL
-- Insert into Person table INSERT INTO MCRISS.DBO.PERSON ( SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, FIRST_NAME, LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, LAST_NAME, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE ) SELECT SSN, FIRST_NAME, MIDDLE_INITIAL, LAST_NAME, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE FROM #PersonTemp
Drop Table #PersonTemp
